text: Ezɨ dughiar kamra, Ikiavɨra Itir God, kamaghɨn Devitɨn akaba inigha izir gumazim Gat, a Devitɨn gɨn otivamin bizibar garir gumazim, a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ mangɨ Devit mɨkemegh, ‘Kɨ Ikiavɨra God, kɨ guizbangɨra mɨgei, kɨ 3plan tuaviba nɨ ganɨdi. Eghtɨ nɨ dar tam ginabaghtɨ, kɨ anarɨra gɨn mangɨva, a isɨ nɨ danɨngam.’ ”
